45  {
46  public:
47  typedef ReadArchive BaseClass;

49  ReadArchiveEx(const QString& filePath, const TFileSerializerComp* loggerPtr)
50  : ReadArchive(filePath),
51  m_loggerPtr(loggerPtr)
52  {

56  // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
57  virtual bool IsLogConsumed(
58  const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory* /*categoryPtr*/,
59  const int* flagsPtr = NULL) const
60  {
61  static const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory slaveCategory = istd::IInformationProvider::IC_INFO;
62 
63  return (m_loggerPtr != NULL) && m_loggerPtr->IsLogConsumed(&slaveCategory, flagsPtr);
64  }
65  virtual bool SendLogMessage(istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category, int id, const QString& message, const QString& messageSource, int flags = 0) const
66  {
67  if (m_loggerPtr != NULL){
68  QString correctedMessage = message;
69  QString correctedMessageSource = messageSource;
70 
71  BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource);
72 
73  return m_loggerPtr->SendLogMessage(istd::IInformationProvider::IC_INFO, id, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource, flags);
74  }
75 
76  return false;
77  }
78 
79  private:
80  const TFileSerializerComp* m_loggerPtr;
81  };

136 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
137 int TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::LoadFromFile(
138  istd::IChangeable& data,
139  const QString& filePath,
140  ibase::IProgressManager* /*progressManagerPtr*/) const
141 {
142  if (IsOperationSupported(&data, &filePath, QF_LOAD | QF_FILE, false)){
143  ReadArchiveEx archive(filePath, this);
144 
145  Q_ASSERT(!archive.IsStoring());
146 
147  // TODO: change CompCastPtr to be sure that firstly the data will be casted to the interface,
148  // but NOT the first ISerializable in the composition.
149  iser::ISerializable* serializablePtr = dynamic_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(&data);
150  if (serializablePtr == NULL){
151  serializablePtr = CompCastPtr<iser::ISerializable>(&data);
152  }
153 
154  Q_ASSERT(serializablePtr != NULL);
155 
156  istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(NULL, istd::IChangeable::CF_MODEL);
157 
158  if (serializablePtr->Serialize(archive)){
159  changePtr.SetPtr(&data);
160 
161  return OS_OK;
162  }
163  else{
164  OnReadError(archive, data, filePath);
165  }
166  }
167 
168  return OS_FAILED;
169 }
170 
171 
172 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
173 int TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::SaveToFile(
174  const istd::IChangeable& data,
175  const QString& filePath,
176  ibase::IProgressManager* /*progressManagerPtr*/) const
177 {
178  if (*m_autoCreateDirectoryAttrPtr){
179  QFileInfo fileInfo(filePath);
180 
181  if (!istd::CSystem::EnsurePathExists(fileInfo.dir().absolutePath())){
182  SendErrorMessage(MI_CANNOT_SAVE, QObject::tr("Cannot create path to file"));
183  }
184  }
185 
186  if (IsOperationSupported(&data, &filePath, QF_SAVE | QF_FILE, false)){
187  WriteArchiveEx archive(filePath, GetVersionInfo(), this);
188  Q_ASSERT(archive.IsStoring());
189 
190  const iser::ISerializable* serializablePtr = CompCastPtr<iser::ISerializable>(&data);
191  Q_ASSERT(serializablePtr != NULL);
192 
193  if (!CheckMinimalVersion(*serializablePtr, archive.GetVersionInfo())){
194  SendWarningMessage(MI_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION, QObject::tr("Archive version is not supported, possible lost of data"));
195  }
196 
197  if ((const_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(serializablePtr))->Serialize(archive)){
198  return OS_OK;
199  }
200  else{
201  SendInfoMessage(MI_CANNOT_SAVE, QObject::tr("Cannot serialize object to file"));
202  }
203  }
204 
205  return OS_FAILED;
206 }
207 
208 
209 // protected methods
210 
211 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
212 void TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::OnReadError(const ReadArchive& /*archive*/, const istd::IChangeable& /*data*/, const QString& filePath) const
213 {
214  SendWarningMessage(MI_CANNOT_LOAD, QString(QObject::tr("Cannot load object from file ")) + filePath);
215 }
